title: ARAM Queue taking 10+ minutes
body: I don't understand why expected queue time is about 45 seconds and the actual wait time is over 13 times as long. Why is this happening?

replies.body: From the information I've got so far, looks like something happened on the back end causing queue times to be abnormally long.  Summoner's Rift draft queues (Ranked & Normal Draft) should be up now, but we're working to fix blind pick, ARAM, and twisted treeline queues. Can follow updates on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page
